price: 60. Esta es la verdad procedente de tu Señor; no seas, pues, de los que dudan[105] (sobre ella).
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ
footnotes: [105]  Ver la nota de pie de la aleya 147 de la sura 2.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takun mina al-mum'tarīna
